Package autumn.lang.compiler.ast.commons

Interface IStatement

All Superinterfaces:
IConstruct
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssertStatement, AssumeStatement, BranchStatement, BreakStatement, ContinueStatement, DelegateStatement, DoUntilStatement, DoWhileStatement, ExpressionStatement, ForeachStatement, ForeverStatement, ForStatement, GotoStatement, IfStatement, Label, LambdaStatement, LetStatement, MarkerStatement, NopStatement, RecurStatement, RedoStatement, ReturnValueStatement, ReturnVoidStatement, SequenceStatement, ThrowStatement, TryCatchStatement, UntilStatement, ValStatement, VarStatement, WhenStatement, WhileStatement
public interface IStatement extends IConstruct
An instance of this interface is an AST node that is a statement construct.
